1.name: March Speed (Cavalry)
1.text: Increases march speed of cavalry units by ${1}%

2.name: Attack (Cavalry)
2.text: Increases attack of cavalry units by ${1}%

4.name: Health (Cavalry)
4.text: Increases health of cavalry units by ${1}%

5.name: Dragon Saber
5.text: Increases normal attack damage of all troops led by this commander by ${1}%

6.text: Increases health of cavalry units by ${1}%

7.name: Attack (Cavalry)
7.text: Increases attack of cavalry units by ${1}%

8.name: Halberd
8.text: Cavalry units led by this commander deal an additional ${1}% damage to archer units

9.name: Charge
9.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to less than 50% strength, increases march speed by ${1}%

10.text: Increases march speed of cavalry units by ${1}%

11.name: Undying Fury
11.text: Normal attacks grant an additional ${1} rage

16.name: March Speed (Cavalry)
16.text: Increases march speed of cavalry units by ${1}%

17.name: Equestrian Excellence
17.text: Normal troop attacks have a 10% chance to increase march speed by ${1}% for the next 2 seconds

18.name: Disarm

20.name: Rallying Cry
20.text: Increases all damage dealt by ${1}% during the first 10 seconds after entering battle
